sub_title: Director / secretary Pension Office Stichting Dow Pensioenfonds bij Dow
summary:
Experienced professional in the area of employment law, pensions, Compensation & Benefits, (strategic) HR policy and payrolling. In addition, extensive experience in the area of HR project management, harmonisation of terms of employment, mergers and acquisitions, strategic human resources and optimizing work processes.
Also extensive experience in negotiating with works councils and trade unions regarding collective labour agreements and social (redundancy) plans.
